definition: abbr. for Egypt 埃及[Ai1 ji2]
Germany/German/abbr. for 德國|德国[De2 guo2]
Mongol ethnic group/abbr. for Mongolia 蒙古國|蒙古国[Meng3 gu3 guo2]/Taiwan pr. [Meng2]
to cover/ignorant/to suffer (misfortune)/to receive (a favor)/to cheat
to stop/to pause/to arrange/to lay out/to kowtow/to stamp (one's foot)/at once/classifier for meals, beatings, scoldings etc: time, bout, spell, meal

sentences.chinese: 埃德蒙頓龍僅以植物爲食。

sentences.english: 12 o'clock at Noon in Edmonton is 2 p.m. Eastern Standard Time.
sentences.chinese: 埃德蒙頓中午12點即東部標準時間下午2點。

sentences.english: The finding that Edmontosaurs lived in herds further supports the migration hypothesis.
sentences.chinese: 埃德蒙頓龍屬羣居動物這一發現，支持了遷徙說。

sentences.english: It's only about 9600 kilometres from Edmonton to Shijiazhuang.
sentences.chinese: 從埃德蒙頓到石家莊大約有9600公里。
